channel.title: Gaming (new posts)
channel.description: Posts in the forum category "Gaming" - Discuss gaming other than BvS.

item.title: Byond. The ultimate in gaming!!: Re: Byond. The ultimate in gaming!!
item.content:encoded: Les paris sur la peau sont un type de paris extrêmement populaire. Comme vous le savez probablement, les objets CSGO en jeu ont une réelle valeur sur le marché interne de Steam. Parfois, leur coût peut atteindre des dizaines de milliers de dollars par peau. Plus un joueur passe de temps dans CSGO, plus il est probable qu'il recevra tôt ou tard des skins rares et coûteux. Au fil du temps, presque tout le monde pense à l'opportunité de tirer un réel profit de son inventaire en jeu en constante augmentation. Et ici, de nombreux sites viennent à la rescousse qui se spécialisent explicitement dans les paris sur la peau.

item.title: Byond. The ultimate in gaming!!: Re: Byond. The ultimate in gaming!!
item.content:encoded: Thank you all for the information. I will definitely reconsider all the options.

item.content:encoded: Yes, I play slots from time to time. My favorite game is blackjack. I am very careful when choosing a resource. I constantly read reviews and choose only safe resources.

item.title: Byond. The ultimate in gaming!!: Re: Byond. The ultimate in gaming!!
item.content:encoded: Among them, SlotsSpot deals with the huge number of slot machines that are a dime a dozen these days. You can imagine how difficult it is, just like with the no account casinos, to choose the right one that exactly suits your needs. SlotsSpot is a great help in finding out the most important information and details about them and in discovering all the news on website that has emerged in the gaming world in this day and age.

item.title: Byond. The ultimate in gaming!!: Re: Byond. The ultimate in gaming!!
item.content:encoded:
It is actually great to have this sort of repository for games which are truly a marvel to play with.

Though for my ps3, my latest game cartridge would be Skyrim though it is a toss up between that and Modern Warfare 3 for the contender on which game I play the most.

I hope to find other people who are into those games as well and you could hit me up over the PSN with ricfns.

item.title: goal to get item in League of Legends named after Billy Vs. Snakeman: Re: goal to get item in League of Legends named after Billy Vs. Snakeman
item.content:encoded: If I didn't already play i'd so sign up.

item.title: goal to get item in League of Legends named after Billy Vs. Snakeman: goal to get item in League of Legends named after Billy Vs. Snakeman
item.content:encoded:
First off here is the link for my referral page.

http://signup.leagueoflegends.com/?ref=4db02e22c11a4251158774

Its a free to play game that is fun whether or not you want to help with the item naming, all you have to do for the referral to count is reach lvl 5, which is not very hard.

When I reach 1000 referrals I will name an item after whatever the most voted BvS item is that appears in this thread.

I want to do this as a thank you to McMasters for making BvS, and as a way to further promote his game. I love playing this as much as LoL and hope that others will be able to enjoy both games as much as I do.

I will also update everyone periodically on the progress of this endeavor.

Thank you, and wish me luck.
